title: Plugging In For $$x$$ and $$y$$
speech: Plugging in  x is equal to 4  and  y, is equal to 1 , we get  4 squared, plus 13 times 4 minus 7 times 1 squared
pacedSpeech: Plugging in   x is equal to 4
, we get   4 squared, plus 13 times 4 minus 7 times 1 squared

title: Simplifying the Expression
text: Simplifying the given expression using PEMDAS, we get $$21$$.
speech: Simplifying the given expression using PEMDAS, we get  21 .
